scripts.release: vite build && cd mangle_website_production && git add * && git commit -m 'Release build' && git push && plink mangle_website -batch "cd mangle_website_production && git pull && sudo docker container restart mangle-website && sleep 3 && sudo docker container logs mangle-website
scripts.restart_api: plink mangle_website -batch "cd mangle_website_production && git pull && sudo docker container restart mangle-api && sleep 3 && cat logs/api/errors.log"
